imdb.title: Kaze no stigma
imdb.plot: Yagami Kazuma was part of a family of fire users, the Kannagi family. But with no talent in fire magic he was banished and cast out from the family. After four years he returns to Japan as a powerful wind user.

episodes.title: Return of the Wind
episodes.plot: Kazuma Kannagi is a descendent of an ancient Japanese family skilled the art of fire magic. Unfortunately for him, the gift seems to have skipped a generation.

episodes.title: Confrontation with the Past
episodes.plot: Reunions come in all shapes and sizes, but when Kazuma and his father meet face to face for the first time in years, someone's going to end up hurt ? or dead.

episodes.title: Kannagi Family Head
episodes.plot: Kazuma and Ayano join forces to save someone dear to them both. He'll bring the wind, and she'll supply the fire, as they take on the fight of their lives.

episodes.title: Contractor
episodes.plot: With Ren ? Kazuma's brother and a direct descendent of the Kannagi Family ? in their possession, the Fuga Clan prepares for the sacrifice that will restore their magic.

episodes.title: The One Who Discarded Her Hesitation
episodes.plot: Kazuma's secret rendezvous drives Ayano crazy, but she's not the only one obsessed with the wind mage. There's another pretty lady tearing up the streets of Japan to get close to him.

episodes.title: The Price of Power/Chikara no daishou
episodes.plot: Kazuma better watch his back. The alluring Misao will go to any length to extract revenge for her brother's death ? and she's convinced it's all the wind mage's fault.

episodes.title: The Cost of a Soul/Tamashii no nedan
episodes.plot: Misao falls under the spell of a mysterious stranger who plans to use her to destroy Kazuma. But the windgician has some plans of his own.

episodes.title: Ayano's Disaster/Ayano-chan no sainan
episodes.plot: Like it or not, Kazuma and Ayano can't get away from each other. This time, it's a strange disturbance at the feisty heiress's school that's brings them together.

episodes.title: Meeting Under the Moon/Gekka no deai
episodes.plot: Ren's got his back against the wall and a pretty new friend to impress, so he decides to handle things the way Kazuma would - now there's a family of earth-shakers after him.

episodes.title: The One to be Protected/Mamorubeki hito
episodes.plot: With hormones raging and the forces of puberty dragging him in multiple directions, Ren takes a stand to protect an enchanting girl who mysteriously appears one moonlit night.

episodes.title: Each Decision/Sorezore no ketsui
episodes.plot: With time racing against them, Ren, Kazuma, and Ayano set out to rescue Ayumi and put an end to the twisted antics of the Tsuwabuki Clan.

episodes.title: Confession Under the Moon/Gekka no kokuhaku
episodes.plot: Kazuma meets his match in the beautiful ? but deranged ? Kureha. Born without the power to control Earth Magic, she hatched a plot to destroy her own clan.

episodes.title: Let's Go to the Amusement Park/Yuuenchi ni ikou!
episodes.plot: Fire and Wind investigate an alleged poltergeist infestation at the local amusement park. It?s not long before Ayano and Kazuma get the feeling that they?re being set up.

episodes.title: Another Ayano Disaster/Ayano-chan no saranaru sainan
episodes.plot: A brash, young beauty arrives from across the sea ? intent on building a reputation for her own family by challenging Ayano to a fiery duel.

episodes.title: Catherine Returns/Chasarin ritânzu
episodes.plot: Katherine McDonald, an American skilled in the Fire Arts, is bound and determined to beat Ayano in a duel and lay claim to Enraiha ? the Kannagi Clan?s greatest weapon.

episodes.title: Chichi to ko to
episodes.plot: When Kazuma and Genma have a heart to heart at the outdoor baths, the hotel better hope it has insurance because men of their temperament let their fists do the talking.

episodes.title: Mahou tsukai no taoshikata
episodes.plot: The secrets of the Spirit Arts are being recklessly divulged, and the city erupts into chaos as rogue wannabes make their dreams come true through a sinister and twisted game.

episodes.title: Toukyou RPG
episodes.plot: Teenagers visiting a mysterious website end up harnessing the powers of hell, Kazuma and Ayano are on the case, but they?re going to have their hands full.

episodes.title: Pandemoniumu
episodes.plot: Pandemonium reigns as magic junkies take to the streets and beat each other?s skulls in. Fearing the origin of this power, Ayano and Ren put their problems on hold and search for clues.

episodes.title: Sushoku no zan'ei
episodes.plot: You can run all you want, but sooner or later, the past will catch up to you. Kazuma knows this sensation all too well since he?s been running from memories all his life.

episodes.title: Kyouran no fuujutsushi
episodes.plot: The only woman Kazuma ever loved was cruelly slain by the same fiend behind the sinister Pandemonium that now holds Tokyo in its crushing grip.

episodes.title: Ketsui to shunjun to
episodes.plot: After their last meeting, Bernhardt pieced together what remained of Kazuma?s true love ? fashioning a weapon he could use to drive the contractor of the wind to the brink of madness!

episodes.title: Kouen
episodes.plot: As Pandemonium gathers power from its victims, demons erupt from their unsuspecting hosts. Tokyo?s last chance is Ayano ? to save her city, she must first save Kazuma.

episodes.title: Kaze no mamorishimono
episodes.plot: As Tokyo sleeps, a new threat looms. The Prince of Hell has been summoned, and it will take the full power of the united Kannagi Clan to slay the beast.
